name: BioCrisis (Spina)
description:
A Playstation 1 era survival horror with prerendered backgrounds and tank controls!

Made as a part of the 32-bit Spring Cleaning Game Jam 
and to celebrate the 25th anniversary of the Resident Evil franchise.

Development Team:
Krzysztof Tracz
Joanna Jesionowska

Support:
Paula Pszczola

Info
---------

It is recommended to play this game using a Dualshock game controller. 
If you are having troubles with connecting a PS4 controller to your pc
please download DS4Windows: 
https://github.com/Jays2Kings/DS4Windows/releases

Controls
---------

Gamepad:

D-Pad Up -> Move Forward
D-Pad Down -> Move Backward
D-Pad Left -> Turn Left
D-Pad Right ->Turn Right

Right Bumper (R1) -> Aim

Face Button Down (X) -> Fire/Interact
Face Button Right (Square) -> Run
Face Button Left (Circle) -> Inventory
Face Button Up (Triangle) -> Cancel

Keyboard + Mouse:

Keyboard 'W' -> Move Forward
Keyboard 'S' -> Move Backward
Keyboard 'A' -> Turn Left
Keyboard 'D' -> Turn Right

Keyboard Left Shift -> Run
Keyboard Tab ->Inventory

Right Mouse Button -> Aim/Cancel
Left Mouse Button -> Fire/Interact

=========

Thank you for playing!
